quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Movie and Crash
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, insurrection, craig. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: When Crash first arrives at the managers office in the movie Bull Durham, he tells the pitching coach (played by Robert Wuhl), that they had met before when they both were playing. Crash tells him that he hit a homer off of him while Crash was hitting cleanup for what minor league team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shreveport

questions.question: After Crash is released from his contract in the movie Bull Durham, he starts weighing his options. Skipper tells him that he thinks Crash would make a fine manager and tells him that there might be an opening at what other minor league team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Visalia

questions.question: In the opening scene of the movie Red Dawn, the high school history teacher was giving what lesson?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: on the Mongols

questions.question: In the hit movie Bull Durham, Crash Davis eventually broke the minor league record for most career home runs; however, he was released from the Durham Bulls before breaking it. What team did he hit the record breaking homer for to end his career?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Asheville Tourists

questions.question: Who does Craig say he plays for when asked if he plays sports by the mailman in Next Friday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cucamunga Cracker-Killers

questions.question: When Crash asks Annie (Susan Sarandon) if she has a job in the movie Bull Durham, she said she teaches part time at a local junior college. What subjects does she say she teaches?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: English 101  Beginning Composition

questions.question: In the movie Next Friday, Craig Jones compares someone to Left Eye from TLC.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In Star Trek: Insurrection, the Sona attempt to displace the Baku race from their homeworld, to take advantage of this special quality of the planet.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Regenerative radiation

questions.question: In the movie Bull Durham, Crash Davis (played by Kevin Costner) is added to the team to mentor Nuke. What jersey number is Crashs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 8

questions.question: In the managers office after Nukes professional debut, the manager and pitching coach said Nuke set a new league record for strikeouts (and walks, among other things) in a game. How many strikeouts did Nuke have to set the record in the movie Bull Durham?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 18

questions.question: On one of the Durham Bulls bus rides, Crash describes life in the Show. How long did Crash say he was in the Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 21 days

questions.question: The classic comedy baseball movie Bull Durham includes the infamous shower room tirade by the Bulls skipper in which he calls the players lollygaggers.  He announces the teams poor overall record at the time. What was the Bulls record?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 8-16

questions.question: Before being informed  that he was being released from his contract in the movie Bull Durham, Bobby (played by David Neidorf) talks about his hitting slump and colorfully describes that he 0 for his last how many at bats without getting a hit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 16

questions.question: What rank does James T. Kirk hold in the second Star Trek feature film, Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan (1982)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Admiral

questions.question: In Star Trek: Nemesis, Captain Picards clone was Romulan Praetor Shinzon.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Eyes
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, villains, villain. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What place of business was turned into a prison camp for residents of Calumet in the film Red Dawn?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Drive In Theater

questions.question: In the 1984 movie Red Dawn, Colonel Bella, the commander of the invading forces in Calumet, was an officer in what nations invading army?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cuba

questions.question: Who is the villains henchman in For Your Eyes Only, who brings a suitcase full of money at the swimming pool?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emile Locque

questions.question: In the movie Red Dawn, when the pilot briefs the Wolverines on the current state of the war, he tells them that in the east they stopped at what geographical landmark?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Mississippi River

questions.question: During a scene of the movie Red Dawn, the Wolverines come across a downed American Air Force pilot. What type of aircraft does he say he flies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: F-15

questions.question: When Jed from the movie Red Dawn drops off his brother Matty and his friend at school on the fateful morning, the football scoreboard shows they lost the previous nights game. What was the nickname of the team the Wolverines played?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grizzlies

questions.question: In the film Red Dawn, during his lesson, the teacher said that the armies would form a semi-circle around their enemies, about the size of what U.S. state?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rhode Island

questions.question: What does James Bond do with the submarine device at the end of the film For Your Eyes Only?

options.text: He sends it to London in the diplomatic luggage.
He throws it  away and lets it crush on the rocks.
He hands it over to the Soviet General
He hides it inside the Greek monastery.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He throws it  away and lets it crush on the rocks.

questions.question: This Soviet agent is the villain in the movie For Your Eyes Only.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aristotle Kristatos

questions.question: What is the submarine guiding system, featured in the film For Your Eyes Only?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ATAC

questions.question: This character from the movie For Your Eyes Only, whose parents were killed by a pilot working for the villain, is James Bonds female ally.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melina Havelock

questions.question: Who is the ice-skating girl in the movie For Your Eyes Only, who has a crush on James Bond?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bibi Dahl

questions.question: What is the villains nickname in the 1981 movie For  Your Eyes Only?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dove

questions.question: The movie Red Dawn is set in the city of Calumet, which is located in what U.S. state?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Colorado

questions.question: How many of the Wolverines actually live through the end of the movie Red dawn?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2

questions.question: Who hosted the 79th Academy Awards?

questions.question: How much does Smokey owe to Big Worm in the movie Friday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $200

questions.question: What is Mr. Jones eating in the movie Friday when he catches Craig in the refrigerator?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grapes

questions.question: What is the name of Smokeys Mexican friend in the film Friday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hector

questions.question: Who sings the title song in the movie For Your Eyes Only?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sheena Easton

questions.question: In the movie For Your Eyes Only, the so-called countess Lisl von Schlaf, comes from which city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Manchester

questions.question: Who won the award for best actor in a leading role at the 78th Academy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Philip Seymour Hoffman

questions.question: Which actor was not among the nominees for best actor in a supporting role at the 76th Academy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sean Penn

questions.question: At the 77th Academy Awards, The Incredibles lost the award for best animated feature to Shrek 2 .
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Keep Their Heads Ringin is playing on the car radio when Smokey and Craig drive to the store in the film Friday.

questions.question: Who plays Big Worm in the film Friday?

questions.question: Who coaches the ice-skating girl who switches sides at the end of For Your Eyes Only?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jacoba Brink

questions.question: The clothes that Ice Cube wears in the first scene of the movie Friday are exactly the same as the ones that his character wore in the final scene of Boyz N The Hood.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What does Smokeys license plate say in the movie Friday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: FCK IT

questions.question: What movie is Friday character Mr. Jones watching when he asks Craig to bring him some water?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mans Best Friend

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Future
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cafe, huey. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: As explained in Back to the Future, what was Doc allergic to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: synthetic material

questions.question: Huey Lewis made a cameo appearance in the movie Back to the Future.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie Back to the Future, Marty told Lorraines mother that he was in this branch of the military.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Coast Guard

questions.question: What brand of tires were on the DeLorean in the movie Back to the Future?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Goodyear

questions.question: In the movie Back to the Future, Lous Cafe (from 1955) turns out to be an aerobics center in 1985.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: How much per gallon was gasoline in 1955, as seen in the movie Back to the Future?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 19.5¢

questions.question: What is the first name of Jack-Jacks babysitter in the Academy Award-winning film The Incredibles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kari

questions.question: In the Disney/Pixar film The Incredibles, Buddys computer password is Cronos.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The great 1939 movie Juarez was the story of the rise of Democracy in Mexico and the overthrow of the Maximillan rule. Who played Juarez in the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Muni

questions.question: What is the first name of Dashs teacher in The Incredibles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bernie

questions.question: This 1939 movie was the last American-made movie shown in Nazi-occupied France.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington

questions.question: At the beginning of the movie Back to the Future, while riding on his skateboard, Marty grabs hold of which vehicle first?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: pick-up truck

questions.question: Finish the line from Back to the Future character Doc: I remember when this was all farmland as far as the eye could see. Old man Peabody owned all of this. He had this crazy idea about __ __ __.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: breeding pine trees

questions.question: Who won the award for best actress in a leading role at the 75th Academy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicole Kidman

questions.question: What is the first name of the boy on whom Violet has a crush in the film The Incredibles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tony

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Movie and Brian
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, sermon, din. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who played Beau as a 12 -year-old in Beau Geste?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donald OConnor

questions.question: Young Mr. Lincoln was a hit John Ford-directed movie about the fictional early life of Abraham Lincoln. Who starred as Lincoln?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henry Fonda

questions.question: Who played the title role in Gunga Din, the 1939 movie based on the Rudyard Kipling poem?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sam Jaffe

questions.question: Which statement is untrue about the star of the 1939 film The Hound of the Baskervilles?

options.text: A relative of his was stabbed by John Wilkes Booth when Lincoln was assassinated.
He was considered the best fencer in the movie industry.
He was not born in Europe, Canada or the USA .
He fought with the RAF during World War II.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He fought with the RAF during World War II.

questions.question: Who played the three brothers as adults in the 1939 version of Beau Geste, directed by William Wellman?

options.text: Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, and Robert Preston
Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, and Brian Donleavy
Ray Milland, Brian Donleavy, and Albert Dekker
Gary Cooper, Brian Donleavy, and Albert Dekker

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, and Robert Preston

questions.question: During the sermon on the mount in the movie Monty Pythons Life of Brian, the characters mistake one of the beatitudes. According to them blessed are which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cheesemakers

questions.question: In 1939 James Stewart didnt star in Its A Wonderful Life but in Its a Wonderful World.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The movie Monty Pythons Life Brian was banned in Sweden.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Frank Gorshin plays the Joker in the 1960s Batman TV series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Monty Pythons Life of Brian, what group are Brian, Reg and the others a part of?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Peoples Front of Judea

questions.question: In the 1939 movie A Tale of Two Cities, Ronald  Coleman played both Charles Darnay and Sydney Carlton.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Monty Pythons Life of Brian, how many people of Regs group wouldnt gladly give their lives to get rid of the Romans once and for all?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One

questions.question: Destry Rides Again was a comedy/western/love story that featured Marlene Dietrich, Mischa Auer, Brian Donleavy, and Billy Gilbert. Who played the title character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Stewart

questions.question: What is Brians punishment for graffiting a (mis-spelt) insult to the Romans on the palace in the comedy Monty Pythons Life of Brian?

options.text: Writing it out properly one hundred times

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Writing it out properly one hundred times

questions.question: Who directed the 1939 version of The Four Feathers which starred Ralph Richardson, C. Aubrey Smith, and John Clements?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Korda

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Dude and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, leader, villains. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the film The Big Lebowski, The Dude refers to a certain animal as a marmot.  What is the correct name for this creature featured in the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ferret

questions.question: Which Scary Movie spoofed Airplane, The Ring, 8 Mile, Signs and American Idol?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scary Movie 3

questions.question: Who plays Mr. Freeze in the 1997 movie Batman and Robin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arnold Schwarzenegger

questions.question: Of the four actors listed below, which one has not appeared in another movie written or directed by the Coen Brothers as of 2007?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeff Bridges

questions.question: What is the name of the newspaper editor who carries out a campaign against Spider-Man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J. Jonah Jameson

questions.question: Phoenix is the evil side of Marvel Comics character Jean Grey.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Saruman the White is an enemy of Sauron, the main villain of The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the real name of the Penguin, one of Batmans greatest enemies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oswald Cobblepot

questions.question: Who is the leader of the villains that come to earth in the 1978 movie Superman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: General Zod

questions.question: What burger joint did The Dude, Walter, and Donny stop at on the way back from Larry Sellers house?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In-N-Out Burger

questions.question: This 1984 movie starring Val Kilmer takes jabs at cold war spy thrillers and Elvis musicals.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Top Secret

questions.question: Kentucky Fried Movie spoofed space movies like Star Wars and Star Trek.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the end of the film The Big Lebowski, The Dude finally receives a replacement rug.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The Dude takes a cab home from the Malibu Sheriffs office with a hostile cab driver who loves to listen to The Eagles.  The problem is, The Dude has had a rough night and hates The Eagles!  What is the name of the song that is playing in the cab?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peaceful, Easy Feeling

questions.question: Which Scary Movie film spoofed Scream, The 6th Sense, I Know What You Did Last Summer and Halloween?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scary Movie
